name: Firelight Occultist
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Firelight" card. You can only use each of the following effects of "Firelight Occultist" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 face-up Pendulum monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: During your Main Phase: You can Ritual Summon 1 Level 4 "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck, then destroy this card. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Firelight" monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
